biotools.summary:
A converter for human genome imputation output format to VCF format.

BACKGROUND:For a genome-wide association study in humans, genotype imputation is an essential analysis tool for improving association mapping power. When IMPUTE software is used for imputation analysis, an imputation output (GEN format) should be converted to variant call format (VCF) with imputed genotype dosage for association analysis.

bioschemas.name: GEN2VCF
